data.name: Freezer Pops - Adult Art Pack
data.detailed_description:
Wanna Freezer Pops H-scenes in your pocket as well as check the backstage of the game?


This pack contains Freezer Pops H-scenes and a pdf document with the backstage of the game (in terms of art). You'll be able to check how we created the characters, their sketches, and some mistakes we made. In other words, you'll get:


  • A folder with all H-scenes in the original resolution (1920x1080);
  • A PDF document with the backstage of the game including sketches from the scenes, characters' art process, art mistakes, and much more!

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Freezer Pops\Adult Art Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
